modName: AU's Guide To Fixing The Grey Face Bug
summary: This is a small text file which tells you how to fix the Grey Face bug without generating new FaceGen files.
descriptionHtml:
Using duplication of NPCs it's really easy to fix the Grey Face bug without generating new assets. You can find out how in the downloadable file.

Check out my [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKRSTAVemC9Kwt-6QeGZw2g]YouTube Channel[/url]
author: AU Delusional
